wikitext.*:
'''Estirin''' was a town in the west of [[Tol Eressëa]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name="Qen"/> It was identified by [[Tolkien]] with [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exeter Exeter].<ref name="Qen"/>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Estirin'' is in [[Qenya]]. It is glossed as "Outer Tower" by ''[[Eldamo]]'', potentially being a compound of ''[[es-]]'' ("out") + ''[[tirin]]'' ("tower").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-2813664135.html|articlename=ᴱQ. ''Estirin'' loc.|website=Eldamo|accessed=28 March 2022}}</ref>

'''''Estirios''''', an alternative form of the name, is given in the ''[[Qenya Lexicon]]''.<ref name="Qen">{{PE|12}}, p. 36</ref>
